html:
9.18.21  12:09 am   i recently started doing a variation on the "put all projects in a list and use a random number generator to pick which one to work on next" idea and hoooly cow i feel like i'm making so much more progress on a lot of them now. anyways my question is how did you first decide to try that strategy?

      about 10 years ago

9.17.21  10:44 pm   is your velocity at a constant speed

      no

9.17.21  10:43 pm   i can't think of a question, any suggestions 

      how about changing the world

9.17.21  10:42 pm   everything is a lie?

      no

9.17.21  10:37 pm   are you religious 

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

9.17.21  10:35 pm   so you think you know it all

      no

9.17.21  10:06 pm   I have more wild and cool dreams at night than other people. is this ok

      the part that seems strange is that you think you know what dreams other people have

9.17.21  9:31 pm   What's your opinion on the flying spaghetti monster?

      a promising franchise. a 'sure thing'

9.17.21  7:58 pm   What is the meaning of life?

      things changing, staying the same, and things changing between staying the same and changing

9.17.21  7:54 pm   what was the bad thing you did you never said why

      failed at producing a song too quickly nor too slowly, and accidentally ended up working on it for exactly the right amount of time

9.17.21  5:23 pm   when is your next video

      i'm doing it now

9.17.21  3:17 pm   do you make songs with music theory in mind or mostly by "feel"?

      that's the same thing, and yes

9.17.21  2:36 pm   why is it that we are rotate on w0rld

      to keep things interesting

9.17.21  2:11 pm   why does water exist

      to keep things interesting

9.17.21  2:06 pm   whats a human action

      kicking?

9.17.21  12:51 pm   What's the deal with airline food

      best food. airlines have the best food, to distract you from how high up in the air you are

9.17.21  12:46 pm   bill how do i draw the shadow of a triangular prism i need help

      model it in 3D and then draw what you see

9.17.21  12:39 pm   why do we dream?

      just to get a nice daily dose of common sense

9.17.21  10:01 am   do you know why time is so immensely horrible and our bodies are constantly deteriorating? 

      this is a good incentive to get something done before the time runs out

9.17.21  9:48 am   If you could create a new color what would it be

      light

9.17.21  9:37 am   What does the sun taste like? 

      light

9.17.21  5:32 am   whats on your mind

      how to make videos/songs in a drastically more frequent time frame than i've ever achieved before

9.17.21  1:36 am   What are you working on right now?

      trying to develop techniques for making videos/songs in a drastically more frequent time frame than i've ever achieved before

9.17.21  1:32 am   why are you so cool

      you could be looking in a mirror

9.17.21  12:27 am   is there any song lyrics of yours you dislike?

      yes

9.16.21  10:56 pm   why do humans enjoy feeling superior to other people

      this could be a side-effect of the desire to improve themselves

9.16.21  9:32 pm   would you please give me the blessing to commit tax fraud

      no

9.16.21  7:46 pm   I GOT A GUITAR BUT MY FINGERS ARE TOO BIG AND KEEP SNUBBING OUT THE NOTES WHAT DO I DO 

      maybe you could play some barre chords

9.16.21  6:48 pm   what is it like to think?

      insane

9.16.21  6:31 pm   I'm in a limbo with song ideas, any ideas on how to get out of the perpetual state of not knowing what to do?

      travel around

9.16.21  6:20 pm   mr bill do you know what the time is

      yes but it changed

9.16.21  4:17 pm   what Level are you on right now

      2 or 3

9.16.21  4:10 pm   music recommendations? playlist is dry

      living in america, james brown

9.16.21  4:00 pm   Opinion On Toast

      melt the opinion first, so it will spread easier onto the toast

9.16.21  1:23 pm   Do you ever find when you are home you want to go out but whenever you are out you want to come home?

      yes

9.16.21  12:49 pm   would you rather figure things out or make things for others to figure out

      i would like to figure things out, and then the things will change, which will give me another opportunity to figure it out. and i would also like to display this process in as many ways as i can, so other people can go along for the ride

9.16.21  12:02 pm   why is every thing so smart and intelligent?

      to rock your world

9.16.21  10:34 am   why do you do what you do?

      i'm just trying to get everyone to be neighbors

9.16.21  10:25 am   why did you say 10:24 in the airport terminal

      because it sounded the nicest, and it's also important that it was not a round number (10:00, 11:00), because flight times don't adhere to that

9.16.21  8:46 am   How to be like you

      impossible. i can't even do it

9.16.21  8:17 am   Is there something more important than reaching the end?

      starting at the beginning?

9.16.21  7:52 am   whats your favorite letter

      o

9.16.21  4:11 am   what's currently stopping you from releasing this new song of yours?

      it doesn't have a video yet. right now i'm trying to develop some tricks to be able to make a video in 2 days instead of 2 hundred years. this goal has become very important to me, for some reason

9.16.21  3:02 am   your music makes me very happy :) i hope you are having a good day mr wurtz 

      holy cowboy you are very friendly

9.16.21  2:27 am   why do you exist

      to experiment with time and space

9.16.21  1:11 am   can't sleep. suggestions?

      try to plan out your entire life

9.15.21  11:35 pm   is there a hidden secret message in your songs 

      yes, the secret message is that i would like to make more songs

9.15.21  10:54 pm   hey bill are there any ways to avoid back pains?

      make a simple demo video each day, showing all the basic ways your body moves

9.15.21  10:53 pm   i had a question but forgot what i asked. Do you remember?

      i think it was probably this

9.15.21  9:24 pm   how do I tell someone I love them without being weird about it?

      you could get into a long term relationship with them
